original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 787: VDO Ninja — It’s a Little Bit Hacky
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and Katherine Druckman chat with Steve Seguin about VDO.Ninja and Social Stream Ninja, tools for doing live WebRTC video calls, recording audio and video, wrangling comments on a bunch of platforms, and more!


 https://docs.vdo.ninja/
 https://docs.vdo.ninja/steves-helper-apps
 https://docs.vdo.ninja/sponsor
Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right in the Hackaday Discord? Have someone youd like use to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast:

title: VDO.NinjaとSocial Stream Ninja: ライブWebRTCビデオ通話のツール
body: Jonathan BennettとKatherine DruckmanがSteve SeguinとVDO.NinjaやSocia Stream Ninjaについて話す。WebRTCビデオ通話、オーディオ・ビデオ録音、複数プラットフォームのコメント管理などを扱うツールに関する情報。記事のリンクも記載。
titles: VDO.NinjaとSocial Stream Ninja: ライブWebRTCビデオ通話のツール
